name: World Cup 2002: Group A Online Quiz | FIFA World Cup | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Denmark.

	Defending champions France finished bottom of the group with just one point and no goals in the competition.

questions.text: Who scored the only goal of the game as Senegal beat France 1-0 in the opening match of the tournament?
questions.explanation:
Papa Bouba Diop.

	Diop scored in the 30th minute to set up a shock win over the defending champions.

questions.text: What was the final score between Uruguay and Denmark?
questions.explanation:
Uruguay 1 Denmark 2.

	Jon Dahl Tomasson scored twice to set the Danes on the way.

questions.text: France v Uruguay: who was sent off during this match?
questions.explanation:
Thierry Henry (France).

	France had the most possession during this game, with a man down, but still drew the game 0-0.

questions.text: Denmark v Senegal: who scored the goals during this 1-1 draw?
options: Jon Dahl Tomasson (Denmark) & Papa Bouba Diop (Senegal)
questions.explanation:
Jon Dahl Tomasson (Denmark) & Salif Diao (Senegal).

	Tomasson scored a penalty for Denmark in the 16th minute only for Diao to cancel it out with a 52nd minute strike.

questions.text: Denmark v France: who made his return from injury to the French side in this match?
questions.explanation:
Zinedine Zidane.

	Even with Zidane in the team for their 3rd and last group game, France couldn't get the momentum going and crashed out of the World Cup.

questions.text: Denmark v France: who scored Denmark's first goal in this game?
questions.explanation:
Dennis Rommedahl.

	Denmark won the game 2-0 with Tomasson completing the score.

questions.text: Senegal v Uruguay: how many goals were scored in this match?
questions.explanation:
6.

	The game finished in an entertaining 3-3 draw. Senegal were leading 3-0 at half time.

questions.text: Who did table-toppers Denmark go on to meet in the second round?
questions.explanation:
England.

	The second round game would see Denmark sent home by England after losing 3-0.

questions.text: Who did Senegal, as runners-up in the Group, go on to meet in the second round?
questions.explanation:
Sweden.

	In the second round game, Senegal beat Sweden 2-1 with a golden goal.
